item.description: ‘F2P’ MMORPG game similar to World of Warcraft I enjoy gaming the game ^_ __+ Andor Training Mini Game Create a new macro and add the following two lines /script UseExtraAction(1) /script SpellTargetUnit("mouseover") Drag the macro to an action bar and map it to a key like F3 Do it. Do it for the horde. Advanced Auction House tooltip Mouse hover on certain items displays recent AH prices for that item
